AI Description: RSEM (RNA-Seq by Expectation Maximization) is a software package for estimating gene and isoform expression levels from RNA-Seq data. It quantifies the abundances of transcripts by calculating maximum likelihood estimates based on the Expectation-Maximization algorithm.
Core Features: Estimation Of Gene & Isoform Expression Levels From RNA-Seq Data, Calculation Of Transcript Abundances Using Expectation-Maximization Algorithm, Support For Various RNA-Seq Data Formats, Includes Programs For Building Reference Indices & Performing Transcript Abundance Estimation
